title: [BUG] Allow non HW accelerated SKGLView
body:
Currently the view will fail on the "Apple Software Render" system, via a null ptr exception at
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/source/SkiaSharp.Views/SkiaSharp.Views.Mac/SKGLView.cs#L79

**Code**

there is a fix noted here
https://github.com/xamarin/mac-samples/blob/c9216f3aa482739238254123f81949c63f190f56/GLSLShader/MyOpenGLView.cs#L68

that could be applied to here
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/source/SkiaSharp.Views/SkiaSharp.Views.Mac/SKGLView.cs#L67

**Expected Behavior**

it to fall back to none accelerated as needed

**Actual Behavior**

null pointer exception

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.8.0
- IDE:  Visual Studio for Mac
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - macOS:  10.15
